leaflet.candidateName: Susan Kramer, James Chard, Andrew Horsler & Silvia Montello

messages.title: Decision time 2010:
messages.content: Who is the best person to stand up for us? Local Champion Susan Kramer OR The out of touch Conservative

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opening a new secondary school, fighting for a fairer funding deal for our children.
Investing in carbon schemes, more recycling, climate measures and green jobs.

mentions.candidate: Susan Kramer, James Chard, Andrew Horsler, Silvia Montello

issues.education: Opening a new secondary school, fighting for a fairer funding deal for our children
issues.environment: Making Richmond greener, 2000 more street trees, investing in carbon schemes, more recycling, climate measures and green jobs.
issues.health: The council has increased spending on local health services and cleaning up our air making us the cleanest borough in London.

leaflet.personalStatement: Susan Kramer has a strong record of action for Barnes.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strong record of action for Barnes

images.caption: Susan Kramer and Andrew Horsler at the outdoor gym at the Cassel Hospital.
Susan Kramer and the local Lib Dem team are working to keep our streets safer.
